amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the provisions of the bill only to cases brought in Federal court.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to apply the provisions of the bill only to cases brought in federal court.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 261 (Roll no. 49).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Watt.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Watt amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 158 - 261 (Roll no. 49).
